div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1663 Tel el Athrib, near Benha (anc. (1082) Athribis), 50 km. N of Cairo, 1905 Burial: 4th cent. B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 700 AR, 1 die Alexander III: 1 tetradr. (from hoard?) Athens: 109 tetradr. Imit. Athens: 130 tetradr. Disposition: Athens, the die and 84 speci- mens (ex Dattari); 460 melted down Dattari, JIAN 1905, pp. 103-14, illus. (many with ctmks. similar to those on early Ptolemaic) Svoronos, CorNum, pp. 285-95; Ath√®nes, pl. 26 Hill, NC 1922, p. 14, note 34
